Moonly Video - Digital Journaling

(currently on pause.)

Every day I record at least one second of video. I then compile it into a Moonly video - a digital journal showing some images and vibe of my life in that period.

I‚Äôve started in February 2017 and kept it going until May 2017. I then had a loooong break until reconnecting with this practice in June 2021. I really enjoy seeing how this practice evolves over time.

Here‚Äôs the list of videos in chronological order. My favourite ones in bold. Scroll down for the latest one.
